Legal_Issue: Whether the RAD erred by applying a reasonableness standard in reviewing the RPD's findings on state protection
Application_Facts: Applicant claimed refugee status due to threats from Jamaican gangs after refusing to participate in election fraud schemes
Decision_Outcome: RAD's decision was found unreasonable; matter remitted for redetermination by a different panel
Remedy_Requested: Redetermination of refugee claim with proper independent analysis
Court_Ruling: Judicial review allowed; RAD decision overturned
Defendant_Behavior: RAD deferred to RPD's findings without independent assessment and overemphasized police report filing
Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of persecution by non-state actors (Jamaican gangs) due to refusal to engage in illegal activities
Legal_Standard: Reasonableness standard vs. independent assessment standard
Assessment_Factor: Availability and adequacy of state protection in Jamaica
Procedural_Issue: RAD failed to conduct de novo review as required
Review_Standard: Reasonableness standard improperly applied by RAD
Credibility_Assessment: RPD rejected claim based on credibility issues; RAD did not independently reassess
Application_Basis: Refugee protection under IRPA based on risk of harm from gangs
Evidence_Assessed: Documentary evidence on country conditions and state response in Jamaica
Relief_Sought: Refugee protection and stay of removal
Governing_Rule: RAD must independently assess state protection, not defer to RPD
Evidentiary_Deficiency: RAD did not provide independent analysis of documentary evidence
Harm_Assessment: Risk of harm from Jamaican gangs due to refusal to assist in election fraud
Cause_Description: Threats from gangs after refusing involvement in election fraud schemes in Jamaica
Evidence_Handling: Improper reliance on failure to file police report as decisive factor
Evidence_Issues: Lack of independent evaluation of evidence by RAD
Evidence_Assessment: RAD failed to properly assess evidence regarding state protection capabilities
Decision_Rationale: RAD's decision was unreasonable due to lack of independent analysis and incorrect focus on procedural step (police report)
Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient consideration of documentary evidence on state protection
